item.title: Why is math so abstract
item.description: Motivation Have you ever wondered why is math so abstract? In this article I want to dive deeper into this question and give you some examples to demonstrate what actually is abstraction in math and why it is important. But first… let’s make clear what we mean by word abstract. What is abstract?? Abstract thing is something that only exist as a thought or an idea. It doesn’t exist in the real world.
